mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO diploma (graduation_catalog_id, major_id, student_id, full_name, date_of_birth, place_of_origin, sex, indigenous_id, nationality_id, ranking_id, year_graduation, mode_of_study, donvi_symbol, serial_number, reference_number, signer, signer_title, foreign_language, level_foreign_language, date_of_enrollment, date_of_graduation, training_course, date_of_defend, hoi_dong_thi, decision_number, decision_establishing_council, req_type_id, gpa, diploma_type_symbol, training_period_semester, total_credits, diploma_link, appendix_lnk, hash, transaction_id, note, status, created_by, created_date, last_modified_by, last_modified_date) VALUES(#{graduationCatalogId}, #{majorId}, #{studentId}, #{fullName}, #{dateOfBirth}, #{placeOfOrigin}, #{sex}, #{indigenousId}, #{nationalityId}, #{rankingId}, #{yearGraduation}, #{modeOfStudy}, #{donviSymbol}, #{serialNumber}, #{referenceNumber}, #{signer}, #{signerTitle}, #{foreignLanguage}, #{levelForeignLanguage}, #{dateOfEnrollment}, #{dateOfGraduation}, #{trainingCourse}, #{dateOfDefend}, #{hoiDongThi}, #{decisionNumber}, #{decisionEstablishingCouncil}, #{reqTypeId}, #{gpa}, #{diplomaTypeSymbol}, #{trainingPeriodSemester}, #{totalCredits}, #{diplomaLink}, #{appendixLnk}, #{hash}, #{transactionId}, #{note}, #{status}, #{createdBy}, #{createdDate}, #{lastModifiedBy}, #{lastModifiedDate}) RETURNING id;
select LASTVAL() as id

INSERT INTO diploma (graduation_catalog_id, major_id, student_id, full_name, date_of_birth, place_of_origin, sex, indigenous_id, nationality_id, ranking_id, year_graduation, mode_of_study, donvi_symbol, serial_number, reference_number, signer, signer_title, foreign_language, level_foreign_language, date_of_enrollment, date_of_graduation, training_course, date_of_defend, hoi_dong_thi, decision_number, decision_establishing_council, req_type_id, gpa, diploma_type_symbol, training_period_semester, total_credits, diploma_link, appendix_lnk, hash, transaction_id, note, status, created_by, created_date, last_modified_by, last_modified_date) VALUES
#{element.graduationCatalogId}, #{element.majorId}, #{element.studentId}, #{element.fullName}, #{element.dateOfBirth}, #{element.placeOfOrigin}, #{element.sex}, #{element.indigenousId}, #{element.nationalityId}, #{element.rankingId}, #{element.yearGraduation}, #{element.modeOfStudy}, #{element.donviSymbol}, #{element.serialNumber}, #{element.referenceNumber}, #{element.signer}, #{element.signerTitle}, #{element.foreignLanguage}, #{element.levelForeignLanguage}, #{element.dateOfEnrollment}, #{element.dateOfGraduation}, #{element.trainingCourse}, #{element.dateOfDefend}, #{element.hoiDongThi}, #{element.decisionNumber}, #{element.decisionEstablishingCouncil}, #{element.reqTypeId}, #{element.gpa}, #{element.diplomaTypeSymbol}, #{element.trainingPeriodSemester}, #{element.totalCredits}, #{element.diplomaLink}, #{element.appendixLnk}, #{element.hash}, #{element.transactionId}, #{element.note}, #{element.status}, #{element.createdBy}, #{element.createdDate}, #{element.lastModifiedBy}, #{element.lastModifiedDate}
mapper.select: select dip.*, mj.name as major, inds.indigenous_name as indigenous, na.nationality_name as nationality, dt."name" as diploma_type, rg.ranking_name as ranking, rt.req_type_name as req_type, dv.name as donvi from diploma dip inner join major mj on mj.id=dip.major_id inner join indigenous inds on inds.indigenous_id = dip.indigenous_id inner join nationality na on na.nationality_id = dip.nationality_id inner join diploma_type dt on dt.symbol = dip.diploma_type_symbol inner join ranking_graduation rg on rg.id = dip.ranking_id inner join request_type rt on rt.id = dip.req_type_id inner join donvi dv on dv.symbol = dip.donvi_symbol
